Awesome mod for scaling the currently unscalable game UI. Although it does not scale the VAB UI at the moment. Would be great if it did in a future update.

Github link  -   https://github.com/Halbann/UIScaler

Link to Halbann's subsequent official post with detailed description of the mod; used for reporting bugs, requesting new features or compatabilities, and furthering discussion. 

This post is now redundant, request moderator/s to delete thread for simplification.
